dc_title_s: Map of the District of Columbia showing location of schools
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 map | Abstract: Map of Washington, D.C., showing public schools classified by race ("white schools" and "colored schools"). | Notes: Relief shown by contours.|Oriented with north to the upper left.|Map detached from a United States House of Representatives document in the United States congressional serial set (5127 H.doc.8/4): Report of the Commissioners of the District of Columbia for the year ended June 30, 1906. Vol. IV, Report on Board of Education. Washington : Government Printing Office, 1907.|Series transcription from: Report of the Commissioners of the District of Columbia for the year ended June 30, 1906. Vol. IV, Report on Board of Education.|Includes notes. | Scale approximately 1:22,500
